in 3.3 (i0625)

I was debugging a target eclipse with -console and ended up with the following stack trace. As far as I can tell I was not doing anything special.  I had hit return a couple times.  Note that I got several related/similar traces in the console.

I am encountering something very similar using 3.3.0 or 3.4M3, which occurs under the following circumstances:

1) Start a program which outputs text to the console repeatedly.
2) Type something in the console, without pressing enter.
3) Wait for some programmatic output.
4) Select the text you typed and press backspace twice.
